doc.name: VideoPlayer
doc.description:
An actor that displays a AVI, Quicktime or MPEG video file.

This actor accepts an ObjectToken that contains a DataSource. This is typically obtained from the output of the ptolemy.actor.lib.jmf.StreamLoader actor. After the model is run, a window will pop up allowing control of playing, rate of playback, and volume control.
doc.author: James Yeh
